_prompt {
DO
  PRINT("Entrez un nombre entre 1 et 100.");
  INPUT(guess);
WHILE guess < 0;
}

main {
LET guess = -1;
LET goal = RND(100);
}

update {
WHILE guess <> goal DO
  GOSUB _prompt;
  IF guess < goal THEN PRINT("Plus grand!"); ENDIF;
  IF guess > goal THEN PRINT("Plus petit!"); ENDIF;
WEND;

PRINT("Bien ouej");
}
